name: Nidoking

attacks.name: Daddy Mode
attacks.effect: Search your deck for 2 basic Pokemon with Nido in their names. Put them on your Bench. You may attach an Energy to one of them. Either way, shuffle your deck afterwards.

attacks.name: Family Issues
attacks.effect: Deal 20 damage for each Pokemon with Nido in its name on your Bench.

flavor: You know nothing's more powerful than the love of family, but you turn that into anger and resentment? Nothing's more dangerous.
